meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7621.

td.p: Morgan Hanson, a Ph.D candidate from Tullahoma, Tennessee
Charles Yu, a technical consultant from Hyattsville, Maryland
Anand Kandaswamy, an economist from Washington, D.C. (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,001)

tr.td: WOLVERINE
"ANT", MAN
AVENGERS
FANTASTIC 4
CAP
MARVEL
